attributes.action: Ask the Queen to grant "Royal" status to the town of Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The whole country is moved by the return of our fallen servicemen.  The town of Wootton Bassett expresses how the country feels by its actions that are unprecedented and unrequested.  This town therefore reflects the true spirit of the UK public towards our Armed Forces, and therefore is due recognition as a conduit for our feelings.

The award of the title "Royal Wootton Bassett" would give the due recognition to the actions of this town, thus further honouring our fallen that pass through.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
